entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
